title: Samsung Galaxy S25 Slim once again rumored to arrive later than the rest of the family
description: At its upcoming Unpacked unveiling event in January, Samsung is expected to announce not three, but four Galaxy S25 devices, with the Galaxy S25 Slim being the fourth member of the family seen in a recently leaked teaser. The Galaxy S25 Slim has been rumored a few times to arrive later in the year than the other three S25 devices, and today a new report corroborates this information thanks to Samsung's latest One UI 7 beta. This contains a list of US carrier-specific Samsung phone models, but the Galaxy S25 Slim's model number is not on the list. That indicates that the Slim isn't...
excerpt: It can still be announced in January, but will be released a few months after the others. At its upcoming Unpacked unveiling event in January, Samsung is...
text: At its upcoming Unpacked unveiling event in January, Samsung is expected to announce not three, but four Galaxy S25 devices, with the Galaxy S25 Slim being the fourth member of the family seen in a recently leaked teaser. The Galaxy S25 Slim has been rumored a few times to arrive later in the year than the other three S25 devices, and today a new report corroborates this information thanks to Samsung's latest One UI 7 beta. This contains a list of US carrier-specific Samsung phone models, but the Galaxy S25 Slim's model number is not on the list. That indicates that the Slim isn't part of the first wave of devices that will be launched running One UI 7 on top of Android 15. Previously, rumors said the S25 Slim would become available in the second quarter of next year (from April to June) and that does track with what's been found inside One UI 7. The Galaxy S25 Slim will allegedly come with a 6.66-inch screen, a 200 MP main camera, a 50 MP ultrawide, a 50 MP telephoto camera with 3.5x optical zoom, and the Snapdragon 8 Elite chipset. It is rumored to sport a 4,700 mAh to 5,000 mAh battery. Source
html:
At its upcoming Unpacked unveiling event in January, Samsung is expected to announce not three, but four Galaxy S25 devices, with the Galaxy S25 Slim being the fourth member of the family seen in a recently leaked teaser.

The Galaxy S25 Slim has been rumored a few times to arrive later in the year than the other three S25 devices, and today a new report corroborates this information thanks to Samsung's latest One UI 7 beta. This contains a list of US carrier-specific Samsung phone models, but the Galaxy S25 Slim's model number is not on the list.

That indicates that the Slim isn't part of the first wave of devices that will be launched running One UI 7 on top of Android 15. Previously, rumors said the S25 Slim would become available in the second quarter of next year (from April to June) and that does track with what's been found inside One UI 7.

The Galaxy S25 Slim will allegedly come with a 6.66-inch screen, a 200 MP main camera, a 50 MP ultrawide, a 50 MP telephoto camera with 3.5x optical zoom, and the Snapdragon 8 Elite chipset. It is rumored to sport a 4,700 mAh to 5,000 mAh battery.

Source
